ROM.Changelog:
So we're moving on to 2.3 beta for Atomic now. Here's a pretty generic changelog :
This version includes fixes and little additions
- Merged android 8.1.0_r14 ( February security patch ) - Added lockscreen option to pass swipe up unlock - Added recent panel settings - Clear all fab button and position - Performance: memory optimizations - Themed DUI dialogs - Themed suggestions card summary text - Fixed network mode bug - Battery saver qs tile improvement - Allow to disable qs footer warnings toggle - Fix some NPE's - Some performance improvements
DEVICE CHANGES -upstream kernel to 3.18.94 -pull some blobs from nokia 6 -other small device changes
